alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 4:44PM EDT until June 15 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lafayette County in Big Bend of Florida... Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 444 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles west of Perry, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mayo, Perry, Pinland, Jug Island, Buckville, Cabbage Grove, Scanlon, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Grady, Hatch Bend, Foley, Salem, Perry-Foley Airport, San Pedro Junction, Hampton Springs, Cedar Island, Cooks Hammock, Secotan and Boyd. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
